name: World War: An Age of Industry & Magic
name_original: World War: An Age of Industry & Magic
description:
World War: An Age of Industry & Magic is a fast-paced, collectible card game. Choose destructive cards of the Military, healing and mystical cards of the Church, or specialized cards of the State and the Academy to crush all enemies who challenge your rule.

World War: An Age of Industry and Magic

Features:


  • Challenging single player campaign
  • 11 unique playable levels
  • Battle 11 rival enemies with distinct play styles and with their own decks
  • Immersive world building and detailed maps
  • Robust deck builder allows users to create a library of decks
  • Game changing “Hero” cards with unique abilities
  • 52 cards ensure dynamic gameplay
  • Player profile customization
  • No pay to play
  • Online matches
